headline.print_headline: Georgia: In Formality, Ban On Gay Marriage Is Struck
headline.main: Georgia: In Formality, Ban on Gay Marriage Is Struck

snippet: A federal judge ruled that Georgia’s constitutional ban on same-sex marriage could not be enforced.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled that Georgia’s constitutional ban on same-sex marriage could not be enforced.
